title: Ohio working on new bill prohibiting the tracking of people with AirTags
content:
For the last year, AirTag has been helping Apple users alike track their lost or stolen items. However, some have been using the tracking device for more nefarious purposes. A news station in Ohio has found a loophole in a law that allows tracking people with electronic trackers. 

more…

The post Ohio working on new bill prohibiting the tracking of people with AirTags appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A news station in Ohio has found a loophole in a law that allows tracking people with AirTags. A new bill is looking to change that.
